{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Roku |model=Premier+ |revision=(4630X) |asin=B01LXUZPQU |fcc_date=09/26/2016 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |availability=now |type=media player,media streamer |fcc_id=TC2-R1013 |ic_id=5959A-R1015 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=MStar |cpu1_model=MSO9380;M ARM, MS09380AMZ-R64-DA9B, AT8B873B, 1619S; |cpu1_cspeed=1.2 GHz |cpu1_cores=4 |fla1=512 |fla1_brand=Toshiba |fla1_model= |ram1=1 GiB |ram1_brand=Samsung |ram1_model=K4B4G1646E-BCNB |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=MicroSD Card slot |expansion_usb_num= |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM43569;Broadcom(R), BCM43569PKFFBG, UE1610 P12, 574737-40 T3 W; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |addl_chips=4.5V to 18V Input Voltage, 3A/2A Output Current Triple Synchronous Buck Converter;Texas Instruments;TPS65261;TPS, 65261, TI 621, CLFS G4;1; |flags=4k, HDR, HDMI 2.0a, IR receiver, |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac }} {{TagLine|HD and 4K UHD Streaming Media Player with HDR}} :{{ProductPage|https://www.roku.com/products/roku-premiere-plus}}{{SupportPage|https://support.roku.com/index}}
CPU: ''MStar'' MSO9380 @1.2GHz (ARM Cortex-A53 Quad Core) {{see also|Roku}} Includes an Advanced Remote with headphones.
*FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/TC2-R1013 TC2-R1013] (2016-08-04) :[[Roku]] 4640X, 4630X, 4620X *FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/TC2-R1009 TC2-R1009] (2015-11-17) :[[Roku]] 4210X2, 4230X2 - Media Player Device :''MUSTANG FOOT'' 4210X2, 4230X2 ([[Lite-On]])
===See also=== [[Roku]] • [https://www.engadget.com/products/roku/ Roku] • [https://www.engadget.com/2016/11/05/roku-express-ultra-review/ Review] • [https://www.techhive.com/article/3123120/streaming-hardware/roku-reboots-its-entire-lineup-with-five-all-new-express-premiere-and-ultra-models.html Review] • [https://images.techhive.com/images/article/2016/09/rokuplayers-100684136-orig.png Table] *[[Roku Ultra (4640X)]] - ''HD and 4K UHD Streaming Media Player with HDR'' *[[Roku Premiere+ (4630X)]] - ''HD and 4K UHD Streaming Media Player with HDR'' *[[Roku Premiere (4620X)]] - ''HD and 4K UHD Streaming Media Player''
